To that end, consider the Nexpow Car Emergency Kit, on sale now at Walmart for 51% off, which drops the price from $90 to just $44. As reviewers say, the kit “comes with everything you need at a reasonable price.”

Nexpow Car Emergency Kit, $44 (was $90) at Walmart
